General._Settings_DESC: Version. Detect if newer default settings are available

Multithreading._Enabled_DESC: Multi Threading (KPPC will create its own process which does the cleaning)
Multithreading._Automatic_DESC: Automatically set number of threads to number of CPU cores
Multithreading._Threads_DESC: Number of threads to use if Automatic is disabled

Logging._Enabled_DESC: Enable Logging to File and Stream (Console)
